meanings.definition: A plant with hairy leaves and clusters of pink, purple, or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The comfrey in the garden has beautiful purple flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted comfrey in my backyard for its lovely pink blooms.
meanings.sent3: The comfrey plant waved its hairy leaves in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: The comfrey stood out in the garden like a colorful bouquet.
meanings.sent5: The clusters of comfrey flowers added a touch of elegance to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A healing herb used in traditional medicine for treating wounds and inflammation.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother used comfrey to help heal my cut.
meanings.sent2: Comfrey is known for its effectiveness in treating inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The comfrey herb seemed to work its magic on the wound.
meanings.sent4: The comfrey acted like a soothing balm on the skin.
meanings.sent5: The healing properties of comfrey are truly remarkable.
